original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśunyatām avatarati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran dharmāṇām sva lakṣaṇa śunya tām avatarati

original: evam avataran na rūpaṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam avataran na rūpam yojayati na viyojayati

original: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na vedanām na saṃjñām na saṃskārān na vijñānam yojayati na viyojayati

original: na rūpaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam pūrva antena yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi pūrvāntam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi pūrva antam eva na samanupaśyati

original: na rūpam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam apara antena yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hy aparāntam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi apara antam eva na samanupaśyati

original: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati

original: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannair yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārān na vijñānam pūrva anta apara anta pratyutpannaiḥ yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannāny eva na samanupaśyati / //
analyzed: tathā hi pūrva anta apara anta pratyutpannāni eva na samanupaśyati

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na pūrvāntam aparāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na pūrva antam apara antena yojayati na viyojayati

original: nāparāntaṃ pūrvāntena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na apara antam pūrva antena yojayati na viyojayati

original: na pratyutpannaṃ pūrvāntenāparāntena vā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na pratyutpannam pūrva antena apara antena vā yojayati na viyojayati

original: na pūrvāntam aparāntaṃ vā pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na pūrva antam apara antam vā pratyutpannena yojayati na viyojayati

original: adhvasamatāśunyatām upādāya / //
analyzed: adhva sama tā śunya tām upādāya

original: evaṃ hi yuktaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ (LPG 23r)
analyzed: evam hi yuktaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ

original: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ yujyate yathā yujyamāno na sarvajñatām atītena yojayati tathā  #
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran evam yujyate yathā yujyamānaḥ na sarvajña tām atītena yojayati tathā

original: hy atītam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: hi atītam eva na samanupaśyati

original: asamanupaśyan /
analyzed: a samanupaśyan

original: kathaṃ sarvajñatām atītena yojayiṣyati /
analyzed: katham sarvajña tām atītena yojayiṣyati

original: na sarvajñatām anāgatena yojayiṣyati /
analyzed: na sarvajña tām anāgatena yojayiṣyati

original: tathā hy anāgatam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatām anāgatena yojayiṣyati /
analyzed: tathā hi anāgatam eva na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan katham sarvajña tām anāgatena yojayiṣyati

original: na sarvajñatāṃ pratyutpannena yojayati /
analyzed: na sarvajña tām pratyutpannena yojayati

original: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatāṃ pratyutpannena yojayiṣyati /
analyzed: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan katham sarvajña tām pratyutpannena yojayiṣyati

original: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam caran śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na rūpam

original: sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan
analyzed: sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan

original: kathaṃ rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayiṣyati / //
analyzed: katham rūpam sarvajña tayā yojayiṣyati

original: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam na vedanām na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati

original: yāvan na cakṣuḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: yāvat na cakṣuḥ sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi cakṣur eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi cakṣuḥ eva na samanupaśyati

original: evan na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyan na manaḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evat na śrotram na ghrāṇam na jihvām na kāyan na manaḥ sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi mana eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi manaḥ eva na samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ na rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam na rūpam sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ na śabdagandharasasparśadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam na śabda gandha rasa sparśa dharmān sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi dharmān eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi dharmān eva na samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ na skandhān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam na skandhān sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: (LPG 23v) tathā hi skandhān eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi skandhān eva na samanupaśyati

original: na dhātūn sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na dhātūn sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi dhātūn eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi dhātūn eva na samanupaśyati

original: nāyatanāni sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na āyatanāni sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hy āyatanāny eva na samanupaśyati / //
analyzed: tathā hi āyatanāni eva na samanupaśyati

original: na cakṣurdhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ dhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi cakṣurdhātum eva na samanupaśyati / //
analyzed: tathā hi cakṣuḥ dhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: na rūpadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na rūpadhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi rūpadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi rūpadhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi cakṣurvijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: yāvan na manodhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: yāvat na manaḥ dhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi manodhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi manaḥ dhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: na dharmadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na dharmadhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi dharmadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi dharmadhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: na manovijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na manaḥ vijñāna dhātum sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi manovijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi manaḥ vijñāna dhātum eva na samanupaśyati

original: asamanupaśyan kathaṃ manovijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayiṣyati /
analyzed: a samanupaśyan katham manaḥ vijñāna dhātum sarvajña tayā yojayiṣyati

original: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatiputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam caran śāradvati putra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na dāna pāramitām sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi dānapāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: tathā hi dāna pāramitām eva na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati

original: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāṃ na vīryapāramitāṃ na dhyānapāramitāṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam na śīla pāramitām na kṣānti pāramitām na vīrya pāramitām na dhyāna pāramitām na prajñāpāramitām sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: tathā hi prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati

original: evaṃ na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇardhipādendriyabalabodhyaṃgamārgān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: evam na smṛti upasthānāni na samyakprahāṇa ṛdhi pāda indriya bala bodhyaṃga mārgān sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: evan na daśa tathāgatabalāni na catvāri vaiśāradyāni na catasraḥ pratisaṃvida (LPG 24r)
analyzed: evat na daśa tathāgata balāni na catvāri vaiśāradyāni na catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ

original: nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na aṣṭādaśa āveṇikān buddha dharmān sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: tathā hi āveṇika buddha dharmān na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati

original: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na buddhaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na buddham sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: na sarvajñatāṃ buddhena yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na sarvajña tām buddhena yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi buddham eva na samanupaśyati sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: tathā hi buddham eva na samanupaśyati sarvajña tām eva na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati

original: na bodhiṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na bodhim sarvajña tayā yojayati na viyojayati

original: na boddhyā sarvajñatāṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: na boddhyā sarvajña tām yojayati na viyojayati

original: tathā hi bodhim eva na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi bodhim eva na samanupaśyati

original: sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
analyzed: sarvajña tām eva na samanupaśyati a samanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati

original: evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ bhāva iti yojayati na rūpaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na rūpam bhāvaḥ iti yojayati na rūpam vibhāvaḥ iti yojayati

original: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na vijñānaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati / //
analyzed: na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam bhāvaḥ iti na vijñānam vibhāvaḥ iti yojayati

original: na rūpaṃ nityam iti yojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam nityam iti yojayati

original: na rūpam anityam iti yojayati evan na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nityam iti yojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam anityam iti yojayati evat na vedanām na saṃjñāt na saṃskārān na vijñānam nityam iti yojayati

original: na vijñānam anityam iti yojayati na rūpaṃ sukham iti yojayati na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati /
analyzed: na vijñānam anityam iti yojayati na rūpam sukham iti yojayati na rūpam duḥkham iti yojayati

original: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sukham iti yojayati /
analyzed: evat na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam sukham iti yojayati

original: na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati /
analyzed: na vijñānam duḥkham iti yojayati

original: na rūpam ātmeti yojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam ātmā iti yojayati

original: na rūpam anātmeti yojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam anātmā iti yojayati

original: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam ātmeti yojayati /
analyzed: evam na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam ātmā iti yojayati

original: na vijñānam anātmeti yojayati /
analyzed: na vijñānam anātmā iti yojayati

original: na rūpaṃ śāntam iti yojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam śāntam iti yojayati

original: na rūpam aśāntam iti yojayati /
analyzed: na rūpam a śāntam iti yojayati

original: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti (LPG 24v) yojayati /
analyzed: evat na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam śāntam iti lpg  yojayati

original: na vijñānam aśāntam iti yojayati /
analyzed: na vijñānam a śāntam iti yojayati

original: na rūpaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti yujyate /
analyzed: na rūpam śunyam iti vai a śunyam iti yujyate

original: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti vā yujyate /
analyzed: na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam śunyam iti vā a śunyam iti vā yujyate

original: na rūpaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate /
analyzed: na rūpam nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate

original: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate /
analyzed: na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate

original: na rūpaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate /
analyzed: na rūpam praṇihitam iti vā a praṇihitam iti vā yujyate

original: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate /
analyzed: na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam praṇihitam iti vā a praṇihitam iti vā yujyate

original: na rūpam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyata iti vā yujyate /
analyzed: na rūpam utpadyate iti vā nirudhyate iti vā yujyate

original: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyaya iti vā yujyate /
analyzed: evam na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam utpadyate iti vā nirudhyaye iti vā yujyate

original: na rūpam atītam iti yujyate /
analyzed: na rūpam atītam iti yujyate

original: na rūpam anāgatam iti yujyate /
analyzed: na rūpam anāgatam iti yujyate

original: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannam iti yujyate evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam atītam iti yujyate na vijñānam anāgatam iti yujyate
analyzed: na rūpam pratyutpannam iti yujyate evat na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam atītam iti yujyate na vijñānam anāgatam iti yujyate

original: na vijñānaṃ pratyutpannam iti yujyate /
analyzed: na vijñānam pratyutpannam iti yujyate

original: na rūpaṃ sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate /
analyzed: na rūpam sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate

original: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate /
analyzed: evat na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate

original: na rūpam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate /
analyzed: na rūpam asti iti na na asti iti yujyate na viyujyate

original: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate /
analyzed: evat na vedanāt na saṃjñāt na saṃskārāt na vijñānam asti iti na na asti iti yujyate na viyujyate

original: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti nopaiti /
analyzed: sa prajñāpāramitāyām carati iti na upaiti

original: na caratīti nopaiti /
analyzed: na carati iti na upaiti

original: caratīti ca na carati ceti nopaiti /
analyzed: carati iti ca na carati ca iti na upaiti

original: naiva carati ca na caratīti nopaiti /
analyzed: na eva carati ca na carati iti na upaiti

original: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam caran śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: na dānapāramitāyā na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: na dāna pāramitāyāḥ na śīla pāramitāyāḥ na kṣānti pāramitāyāḥ na vīrya pāramitāyāḥ na dhyāna pāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: nāvaivartyabhūmeḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: na avaivartya bhūmeḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: na satvaparipākahetoḥ na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ na daśānāṃ (LPG 25r)
analyzed: na satva paripāka hetoḥ na buddhakṣetra pariśodhana artham na daśānām

original: tathāgatabalānāṃ kṛte /
analyzed: tathāgata balānām kṛte

original: na caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ kṛte /
analyzed: na caturṇām vaiśāradyānām kṛte

original: na catasrṇāṃ pratisaṃvidānāṃ kṛte /
analyzed: na catasrṇām pratisaṃvidānām kṛte

original: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: na aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānām buddha dharmāṇām kṛte prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: nādhyātmaśunyatāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: na adhyātma śunya tāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: na bahirdhāśunyatāyā nādhyātmabahirdhāśuntatāyā /
analyzed: na bahirdhā śunya tāyāḥ na adhyātma bahirdhā śunta tāyāḥ

original: na śunyatāśunyatāyā na mahāśunyatāyā na paramārthaśunyatāyā na saṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nāsaṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nātyantaśunyatāyā /
analyzed: na śunyatā aśunyatāyāḥ na mahā śunyatāyāḥ na paramārtha śunyatāyāḥ na saṃskṛta śunyatāyāḥ na asaṃskṛta śunyatāyāḥ na atyanta śunyatāyāḥ

original: nāvarāgraśunyatāyā /
analyzed: na avara agra śunya tāyāḥ

original: nāvakāraśunyatāyā /
analyzed: na avakāra śunya tāyāḥ

original: na prakṛtiśunyatāyā /
analyzed: na prakṛti śunya tāyāḥ

original: na svalakṣaṇaśunyatāyā /
analyzed: na sva lakṣaṇa śunya tāyāḥ

original: na sarvadharmaśunyatāyā /
analyzed: na sarva dharma śunya tāyāḥ

original: nānutpādaśunyatāyā /
analyzed: na anutpāda śunya tāyāḥ

original: nābhāvasvabhāvaśunyatāyāḥ kṛte /
analyzed: na abhāva svabhāva śunya tāyāḥ kṛte

original: na tathatāyāḥ kṛte /
analyzed: na tathatāyāḥ kṛte

original: na dharmadhātor na bhūtakoṭeḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: na dharmadhātoḥ na bhūtakoṭeḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya bhedaṃ vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran kasyacid dharmasya bhedam vā nānākaraṇam vā viśeṣam vā samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam caran śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: sa na divyasya cakṣuṣaḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: sa na divyasya cakṣuṣaḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: na divyasya śrotrasya na paracittajñānasya na pūrvanivāsānusmṛter nardhipādānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: na divyasya śrotrasya na para citta jñānasya na pūrva nivāsa anusmṛteḥ na ṛdhi pādānām kṛte prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam caran śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ na evam

original: bhavaty aham ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
analyzed: bhavati aham ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu

original: lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi //
analyzed: lokadhātuṣu ye buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tān satkariṣyāmi gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi

original: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv
analyzed: evam dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu

original: ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi
analyzed: ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ tān satkariṣyāmi

original: gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi na cāsyaivaṃ (LPG 25v)
analyzed: gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi na ca asya evam

original: bhavati yat te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante tat sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śroṣyāmi /
analyzed: bhavati yat te buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ bhāṣante tat sarvam divyena śrotreṇa śroṣyāmi

original: ahaṃ tatra lokadhātuṣu satvānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ jñāsye /
analyzed: aham tatra lokadhātuṣu satvānām cetasā eva cittam jñāsye

original: ahaṃ eṣāṃ pūrvenivāsān anusmariṣyāmi /
analyzed: aham eṣām pūrvenivāsān anusmariṣyāmi

original: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā tāṃ satvāṃś cyavamānān upapadyamānān upapannāṃś ca drakṣyāmi /
analyzed: aham divyena cakṣuṣā tān satvān cyavamānān upapadyamānān upapannān ca drakṣyāmi

original: aham aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi ti / //
analyzed: aham aprameya asaṃkhyeyān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmi ti

original: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ na labhate /
analyzed: evam khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ māraḥ pāpīyān avatāram na labhate

original: yāny api kānicil laukikalokottarāṇi karaṇīyāni tāny api sarvāṇi pradakṣiṇībhavanty anābhogenāparikalpitāni //
analyzed: yāni api kānicid laukika lokottarāṇi karaṇīyāni tāni api sarvāṇi pradakṣiṇībhavanti anābhogena a parikalpitāni

original: ye ca te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto ye ca
analyzed: ye ca te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ ye ca

original: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv
analyzed: dakṣiṇasyām paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastāt upariṣṭāt yāvat samantāt daśasu dikṣu

original: ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi buddhā
analyzed: ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgā nadī vālukā upameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ te api buddhāḥ

original: bhagavantas taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam ārakṣanti mā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pated iti /
analyzed: bhagavantaḥ tam bodhisatvam mahāsatvam ārakṣanti mā śrāvaka bhūmim vā pratyekabuddha bhūmim vā patet iti

original: ye ca catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvamm
analyzed: ye ca catvāraḥ mahārājāḥ yāvat agha niṣṭhāḥ devāḥ te api tam bodhisatvam mahāsatvam

original: ārakṣanti mā haiva kaścid bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyāntarāyaṃ kārṣīt* ye ca kecit
analyzed: ārakṣanti mā ha eva kaścid bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya antarāyam kārṣīt ye ca kecid

original: kāyikā rogās te 'pi tasya dṛṣṭe 'pi dharme sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavanti /
analyzed: kāyikāḥ rogāḥ te api tasya dṛṣṭe api dharme sarveṇa sarvam na bhavanti

original: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvān maitryā spharati / //
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ sarva satvān maitryā spharati

original: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam caran śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ alpakṛcchreṇa dhāraṇīmukha samādhimukhāni pratibhānapratisaṃvinmukhāny  #
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ alpa kṛcchreṇa samādhi mukhāni pratibhāna pratisaṃvid mukhāni

original: āmukhībhavanti /
analyzed: āmukhībhavanti

original: tathāgatāṃś cārhataḥ (LPG 26r)
analyzed: tathāgatān ca arhantaḥ

original: samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayati /
analyzed: samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayati

original: taiś ca buddhair bhagavadbhir na kadācid virahito bhavati /
analyzed: taiḥ ca buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ na kadācid virahitaḥ bhavati

original: yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate / // //
analyzed: yāvat anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate  /

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ na evam bhavati

original: asti kaścid dharmo yo dharmaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
analyzed: asti kaścid dharmaḥ yaḥ dharmaiḥ sārdham saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā

original: sameti vā na sameti vā /
analyzed: sameti vā na sameti vā

original: tat kasya hetoḥ /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ

original: tathā hi sa tad dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi sa tat dharmam na samanupaśyati

original: yo yujyeta vā viyujyeta vā /
analyzed: yaḥ yujyeta vā viyujyeta vā

original: sameyād vā na sameyād vā :
analyzed: sameyāt vā na sameyāt vā

original: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ na evam

original: bhavati * kaccid ahaṃ dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddhyeya na vābhisaṃbudhyeya tat kasya
analyzed: bhavati kaccit aham dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddhyeya na vā abhisaṃbudhyeya tat kasya

original: hetor na hi dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddho nābhisaṃbudhyate /
analyzed: hetoḥ na hi dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddhaḥ na abhisaṃbudhyate

original: nābhisambhotsyate /
analyzed: na abhisambhotsyate

original: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃcid dharmaṃ dharmadhātuvyatiriktaṃ samanupaśyati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na kaṃcid dharmam dharmadhātu vyatiriktam samanupaśyati

original: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dharmadhātor dharmāṇāṃ ca nānākaraṇaṃ karoti / //
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na dharmadhātoḥ dharmāṇām ca nānākaraṇam karoti

original: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ na evam bhavati

original: dharmadhātuṃ pratividhyeya vā na vā pratividhyeya /
analyzed: dharmadhātum pratividhyeya vā na vā pratividhyeya

original: tathā hi sa na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
analyzed: tathā hi sa na kaṃcid dharmam samanupaśyati

original: yena dharmeṇa yo dharmaḥ pratividhyeta tathā hi na sa dharmadhātuṃ śunyam iti yojayati /
analyzed: yena dharmeṇa yaḥ dharmaḥ pratividhyeta tathā hi na sa dharmadhātum śunyam iti yojayati

original: nāśunyam iti yojayati /
analyzed: na aśunyam iti yojayati

original: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
analyzed: evam khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran yuktaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ

original: (LPG 26v) punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cakṣurdhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
analyzed: punar aparam śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caran na cakṣuḥ dhātum śunya tayā yojayati

original: na śunyatāṃ cakṣurdhātunā yojayati /
analyzed: na śunyatām cakṣuḥ dhātunā yojayati

original: na rūpadhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
analyzed: na rūpadhātum śunya tayā yojayati

original: na śunyatāṃ rūpadhātunā yojayati /
analyzed: na śunyatām rūpadhātunā yojayati

original: na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātum śunya tayā yojayati

original: na śunyatāṃ cakṣurvijñānadhātunā yojayati /
analyzed: na śunya tām cakṣuḥ vijñāna dhātunā yojayati

original: evaṃ na śrotradhātuṃ na śabdadhātuṃ na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ na ghrāṇadhātuṃ na gandhadhātuṃ na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ na jihvādhātuṃ na rasadhātuṃ  #
analyzed: evam na śrotra dhātum na śabda dhātum na śrotra vijñāna dhātum na ghrāṇa dhātum na gandha dhātum na ghrāṇa vijñāna dhātum na jihvā dhātum na rasa dhātum

original: na jihvāvijñānadhātum /
analyzed: na jihvā vijñāna dhātum

original: na kāyadhātuṃ na spraṣṭavyadhātuṃ /
analyzed: na kāya dhātum na spraṣṭavya dhātum

original: na kāyavijñānadhātuṃ /
analyzed: na kāya vijñāna dhātum

original: yāvan na manodhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
analyzed: yāvat na manaḥ dhātum śunya tayā yojayati

original: na śunyatāṃ manodhātunā yojayati /
analyzed: na śunya tām manaḥ dhātunā yojayati

original: na dharmadhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
analyzed: na dharmadhātum śunya tayā yojayati

original: na śunyatāṃ dharmadhātunā yojayati /
analyzed: na śunya tām dharmadhātunā yojayati

original: na manovijñānadhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
analyzed: na manaḥ vijñāna dhātum śunya tayā yojayati

original: na śunyatāṃ manovijñānadhātunā yojayati /
analyzed: na śunya tām manaḥ vijñāna dhātunā yojayati

original: eṣa hi śāradvatīputra paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ śunyatāyāṃ śāradvatīputra caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau  #
analyzed: eṣa hi śāradvatīputra paramaḥ yogaḥ yat uta śunya tā yogaḥ śunya tāyām śāradvatīputra caran bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ na śrāvaka bhūmau vā pratyekabuddha bhūmau

original: vā patati /
analyzed: vā patati

original: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati /
analyzed: buddhakṣetram ca pariśodhayati

original: satvāṃś ca paripācayati /
analyzed: satvān ca paripācayati

original: kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ye kecic chāradvatīputra yogāḥ prajñāpāramitāyogas teṣām agrya-m-ākhyāyate /
analyzed: kṣipram ca anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ye kecid śāradvatīputra yogāḥ prajñāpāramitā yogaḥ teṣām agryam ākhyāyate

original: śreṣṭha varaḥ pravaraḥ praṇīta-m-ākhyāyate tat kasya hetoḥ anuttara eṣa yogo yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogaḥ śunyatānimittāpraṇihitayoga /
analyzed: śreṣṭha varaḥ pravaraḥ praṇītam ākhyāyate tat kasya hetoḥ anuttaraḥ eṣa yogaḥ yat uta prajñāpāramitā yogaḥ śunya tā nimitta apraṇihita yoga

original: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyākṛto vaktavyaḥ asannibhūtaś cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ (LPG 27r)
analyzed: evam yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ vyākṛtaḥ vaktavyaḥ asannibhūtaḥ ca anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ evam yuj

original: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāmm arthaṃ karoti
analyzed: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānām satvānām artham karoti

original: na cāsyaivaṃ bhavaty ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yujye 'ti vā viyujye 'ti vā māṃ buddhā
analyzed: na ca asya evam bhavati aham prajñāpāramitāyām yujye ati vā viyujye ati vā mām buddhā

original: bhagavanto vyākariṣyanty aham āsannībhūto vyākaraṇasya //
analyzed: bhagavantaḥ vyākariṣyanti aham āsannībhūtaḥ vyākaraṇasya

original: ahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi /
analyzed: aham buddhakṣetram pariśodhayiṣyāmi

original: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣye / //
analyzed: aham anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakram pravartayiṣye

original: tat kasya hetos tathā hi sa dharmadhātuṃ na vyatirekīkaroti / //
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa dharmadhātum na vyatirekīkaroti

original: na ca dharmadhātoḥ kaṃcid anyadharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
analyzed: na ca dharmadhātoḥ kaṃcid anya dharmam samanupaśyati

original: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cared yo vā buddhair bhagavadbhir vyākṛyeta /
analyzed: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām caret yaḥ vā buddhaiḥ bhagavadbhiḥ vyākṛyeta

original: yo vānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta :
analyzed: yaḥ vā anuttarām samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta

original: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na satvasaṃjñotpadyate /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ na satva saṃjñā utpadyate

original: na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā na jānakapaśyakakārakavedakasaṃjñotpadyate / //
analyzed: na jīva saṃjñā na pudgala saṃjñā na jānaka paśyaka kāraka vedaka saṃjñā utpadyate

original: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy atyantaṃ satvo nopalabhyate na nirudhyate /
analyzed: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi atyantam satvaḥ na upalabhyate na nirudhyate

original: na hi satvasyotpādo na nirodhaḥ yasya ca notpādo na nirodhaḥ kathaṃ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati /
analyzed: na hi satvasya utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ yasya ca na utpādaḥ na nirodhaḥ katham sa prajñāpāramitāyām cariṣyati

original: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ satvānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: evam caran śāradvatīputra bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ satva anutpāda tayā prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: satvaśunyatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: satva śunya tayā prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: satvānupalabdhyā satvaviviktatayā satvaprakṛtyā /
analyzed: satva anupalabdhyā satva vivikta tayā satva prakṛtyā

original: satvāsvabhāvatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
analyzed: satva asvabhāva tayā prajñāpāramitāyām carati

original: eṣa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ ayaṃ
analyzed: eṣa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām paramaḥ yogaḥ yat uta śunya tā yogaḥ ayam

original: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ paramo yogaḥ
analyzed: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyām carataḥ paramaḥ yogaḥ

original: yas tadanyān yogān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: yaḥ tad anyān yogān abhibhūya tiṣṭhati

original: atra ca śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo mahāmaitrīm abhinirharati /
analyzed: atra ca śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ mahā maitrīm abhinirharati

original: mahākaruṇāṃ cābhinirharati /
analyzed: mahā karuṇām ca abhinirharati

original: atra śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na mātsaryacittam utpādayati /
analyzed: atra śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvaḥ mahāsatvaḥ na mātsarya cittam utpādayati

original: na dauḥśīlyacittaṃ na vyāpādacittaṃ na kausīdyacittaṃ (LPG 27v)
analyzed: na dauḥśīlya cittam na vyāpāda cittam na kausīdya cittam

original: na vikṣepacittaṃ na dauṣprajñacittam utpādayati /
analyzed: na vikṣepa cittam na dauṣprajña cittam utpādayati
